= Introduction =

EzStudyCards is a project created by team of 5 students in UTA Cse5328 Spring 2012 class. The project is to create a simple, user friendly Android app that lets users to create study cards, and review them easily.

The team members are
 * Sudhir Chhetri
 * Gautham Shivashankara
 * Ninad Malvankar
 * Yan Ma
 * Sathish Kumar Kuppusamy
